title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When following the steps to open a file with a different type of editor that is already open, nothing happens. The current editor remains active and does not switch to the new editor type.
EB: When opening a file with a different type of editor that is already open, the software should switch to the new editor type and open the file in that editor.
SR:
1. Open a new basic project
2. Create a new file called 'test.xml'
3. The file 'test.xml' is opened with the scripted resource editor example, which ignores the XML file content.
4. In the Navigator, select 'test.xml'
5. Right-click and choose 'Open With...'
6. Select 'Default Text Editor'
7. Observe that nothing happens and the scripted resource editor example remains active

Note: The expected behavior is that a new editor is opened on the file, using the different editor type.
